title: Telangana: Narsaiah Goud quits TRS
Description: In a big blow to the Telangana Rashtra Samithi (TRS) ahead of the Munugode Assembly bypoll, former TRS MP Dr Boora Narsaiah Goud resigned from the party on October 15. Dr Boora Narsaiah Goud said, â€œI did not criticise the CM (KCR) in my resigna...

title: BJP responsible for Rs 900-crore fine slapped by NGT on Delhi government: AAP
Description: Addressing a press conference here, Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) leader Durgesh Pathak said the people of the national capital will have to pay the price for the inefficiency of the Municipal Corporation of Delhi (MCD), which is run by the BJP. There was no immediate reaction from the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) to the allegation levelled by the AAP.

title: Watch: Telangana govt provides two-wheelers to physically disabled persons
Description: Under the Aasara scheme, the Telangana government has provided two-wheeler vehicles to working physically disabled people. This scheme has helped many disabled people who are facing problems with travelling on public transport. Now, with the scheme's help, they will work on t...
